job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Are you a talented Java developer passionate about using AI to transform the enterprise software industry? Join our team and work on revolutionary solutions that enable service providers to monetize their networks faster, scale effortlessly, and deliver exceptional customer experiences.

   In this role, you'll focus on building and optimizing Charging-as-a-Service, a groundbreaking, cloud-native platform designed to modernize telecom charging systems. You'll develop a highly scalable, multi-tenant charging engine capable of handling global transaction volumes, enabling service providers to go from setup to monetization in record time. Additionally, you'll create tools that use natural language processing and machine learning to design, test, and launch new plans with unprecedented speed and precision. This is your opportunity to be at the forefront of AI-driven innovation in enterprise software, shaping the future of charging and network monetization.

   The application process takes about 4 hours, and you can complete it at your own pace. We value your time, providing assessment results within 48 hours and interview decisions within 2 business days.

   Are you ready to take on this challenge? We're building the future of enterprise software with AI as our compass.

   What you will be doing

     * Developing and deploying Charging-as-a-Service, focusing on scalability, performance, and reliability.
     * Building tools powered by natural language processing and machine learning to streamline plan creation and management.
     * Leveraging cutting-edge AI tools to enhance development efficiency and tackle complex technical challenges.

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Routine Monotony: We keep cumbersome infrastructure tasks to a minimum so you can focus on creating innovative solutions.
     * Endless Meetings: We value your expertise in development over sitting in meeting rooms. Expect more coding, less talking., * Build and optimize telecom charging solutions that enable rapid monetization and limitless scalability.
     * Implement AI-driven features to streamline workflows and empower service providers with innovative tools.
job_details.full_text:
Senior Java Developer, Trilogy (Remote) - $60,000/year USD

Are you a talented Java developer passionate about using AI to transform the enterprise software industry? Join our team and work on revolutionary solutions that enable service providers to monetize their networks faster, scale effortlessly, and deliver exceptional customer experiences.

   In this role, you'll focus on building and optimizing Charging-as-a-Service, a groundbreaking, cloud-native platform designed to modernize telecom charging systems. You'll develop a highly scalable, multi-tenant charging engine capable of handling global transaction volumes, enabling service providers to go from setup to monetization in record time. Additionally, you'll create tools that use natural language processing and machine learning to design, test, and launch new plans with unprecedented speed and precision. This is your opportunity to be at the forefront of AI-driven innovation in enterprise software, shaping the future of charging and network monetization.

   The application process takes about 4 hours, and you can complete it at your own pace. We value your time, providing assessment results within 48 hours and interview decisions within 2 business days.

   Are you ready to take on this challenge? We're building the future of enterprise software with AI as our compass.

   What you will be doing

     * Developing and deploying Charging-as-a-Service, focusing on scalability, performance, and reliability.
     * Building tools powered by natural language processing and machine learning to streamline plan creation and management.
     * Leveraging cutting-edge AI tools to enhance development efficiency and tackle complex technical challenges.

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Routine Monotony: We keep cumbersome infrastructure tasks to a minimum so you can focus on creating innovative solutions.
     * Endless Meetings: We value your expertise in development over sitting in meeting rooms. Expect more coding, less talking., * Build and optimize telecom charging solutions that enable rapid monetization and limitless scalability.
     * Implement AI-driven features to streamline workflows and empower service providers with innovative tools.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on traditional software development using Java and building scalable cloud-native platforms. While it mentions leveraging AI tools, natural language processing, and machine learning to enhance development efficiency and create tools for plan creation, it does not indicate the core responsibilities of designing, developing, fine-tuning, or deploying generative models themselves. The primary focus remains on software engineering with AI as an enhancement rather than the core technology being developed or manipulated. Therefore, it does not fit the 'ML Engineer' or 'GenAI Engineer' profiles.

job_tasks.justification: The role explicitly states 'Senior Java Developer' and focuses on 'building and optimizing Charging-as-a-Service, a groundbreaking, cloud-native platform' and 'develop a highly scalable, multi-tenant charging engine'. It also mentions 'developing and deploying Charging-as-a-Service, focusing on scalability, performance, and reliability' and 'Build and optimize telecom charging solutions'. These are core software development activities.

The description mentions 'building and optimizing Charging-as-a-Service, a groundbreaking, cloud-native platform designed to modernize telecom charging systems' and 'develop a highly scalable, multi-tenant charging engine capable of handling global transaction volumes'. This indicates the development of a core software platform.
job_tasks.phrase: building and optimizing Charging-as-a-Service, a groundbreaking, cloud-native platform

job_tasks.justification: The role involves creating 'tools that use natural language processing and machine learning to design, test, and launch new plans with unprecedented speed and precision.' This implies building software tools that incorporate AI functionalities.
job_tasks.phrase: create tools that use natural language processing and machine learning

job_tasks.justification: The job description states 'developing and deploying Charging-as-a-Service, focusing on scalability, performance, and reliability.' This is a direct description of software development and deployment tasks.
job_tasks.phrase: Developing and deploying Charging-as-a-Service, focusing on scalability, performance, and reliability

job_tasks.justification: The role involves 'Building tools powered by natural language processing and machine learning to streamline plan creation and management.' This is a software development task focused on creating functional tools.
job_tasks.phrase: Building tools powered by natural language processing and machine learning

job_tasks.justification: The description mentions 'Leveraging cutting-edge AI tools to enhance development efficiency and tackle complex technical challenges.' While it's about leveraging tools, the context is within software development to improve the process.
job_tasks.phrase: Leveraging cutting-edge AI tools to enhance development efficiency

job_tasks.justification: The role involves 'Build and optimize telecom charging solutions that enable rapid monetization and limitless scalability.' This is a clear software engineering objective.
job_tasks.phrase: Build and optimize telecom charging solutions

job_tasks.justification: The description states 'Implement AI-driven features to streamline workflows and empower service providers with innovative tools.' This involves integrating AI into software features.

The role aims to 'enable service providers to monetize their networks faster, scale effortlessly, and deliver exceptional customer experiences.' This shows an understanding of the business goals and how the technical solution serves them.
job_tasks.phrase: enable service providers to monetize their networks faster, scale effortlessly, and deliver exceptional customer experiences

job_tasks.justification: The goal of 'modernize telecom charging systems' and enabling 'service providers to go from setup to monetization in record time' clearly aligns technical work with business objectives.
The phrase 'shaping the future of charging and network monetization' indicates a strategic business focus for the technical role.
job_tasks.phrase: shaping the future of charging and network monetization
